findings.title: Potential Precision Loss in Threshold Enforcement
findings.description: In HegicETHPool/HegicERCPool, potential precision loss may occur due to division operation in threshold enforcement.

findings.title: Rounding Issue in Burn Amount Calculation
findings.description: The burn amount calculation uses floor division which may cause rounding issues, it is recommended to revise the logic to use ceiling division.

findings.title: Denial-of-Service in getReward()
findings.description: The logic in getReward() does not validate the given optionID, allowing a malicious actor to submit a getReward() request with an optionID that has not been created yet, preventing the owner of new optionID from receiving rewards.

findings.title: Denial-of-Service in getReward()
findings.description: The logic in `getReward()` does not validate the given `optionID`, allowing a malicious actor to submit a request with an `optionID` that has not been created yet, preventing the owner of new `optionID` from receiving the reward.

findings.title: Precision Loss in Threshold Enforcement
findings.description: The current threshold enforcement of locked amount in the pool may introduce precision loss due to division operation. It is recommended to revise the threshold to avoid any unnecessary precision loss.
